document.full_text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu bluntly told president barack obama on friday his vision of how to achieve middle east peace was unrealistic, exposing a deep divide that could doom any u.s. bid to revive peace talks.
document.title: israeli rebuke of obama exposes divide on mideast
lines_and_colors: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu bluntly told president barack obama on friday his vision of how to achieve middle east peace was unrealistic, exposing a deep divide that could doom any u.s. bid to revive peace talks.
